testcase.name: Query can rerank evidence by text length
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Query can rerank evidence by text length Given I initialized a corpus at "corpus" ... passed in 0.003s And I ingested note items into corpus "corpus": ... passed in 0.010s | text | | short evidence | | a much longer evidence text | And I built a scan run for corpus "corpus" ... passed in 0.004s When I query corpus "corpus" with query "evidence" reranking with "rerank-longest-text" ... passed in 0.005s Then the query result evidence text order is: ... passed in 0.000s | text | | a much longer evidence text | | short evidence |
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Query can filter evidence by minimum score
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Query can filter evidence by minimum score Given I initialized a corpus at "corpus" ... passed in 0.003s And I ingested note items into corpus "corpus": ... passed in 0.008s | text | | keep keep | | keep | And I built a scan run for corpus "corpus" ... passed in 0.004s When I query corpus "corpus" with query "keep" filtering with minimum score 2.0 ... passed in 0.004s Then the query result evidence text order is: ... passed in 0.000s | text | | keep keep |
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
